synopsis.text: When a headless motorcycle rider begins to wreak havoc on a town, the terror escalates on the anniversary of his death as he seeks to behead others. In this special episode of Gakkou no Kaidan, airing after the original anime, Satsuki and her friends find themselves in the crosshairs of the vengeful ghost. With time running out, they must uncover a way to put the rider to rest before it's too late. This chilling tale unfolds prior to the finale of the TV series, promising a thrilling ride for fans.
